misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Hirsala Golf and is known for his resilience and determination on the course. Despite battling back problems throughout his career, Okko approaches every tournament with a steely resolve.

A fierce competitor, Okko has participated in the Hector Trophée on four separate occasions, securing one victory. While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, Okko remains focused on improving his individual performance while being a valuable asset to his pairs team.

Off the course, Okko is known for his jovial nature. The infamous 'Okkotoberfest,' a phenomenon born from his spirited celebrations at a past Hector event, is now a celebrated tradition among players and fans alike. Okko's presence at Hector Trophée 2025 promises to be as captivating as ever.
